page.title: 11COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: COMMUNICATIONS Much of the village or local news is given by the locally printed Parish Magazine, edited by a Stanton Village resident. Forthcoming events are mixed with topics of local interest. Regular features such as gardening news and recipes make up much of the bulk of reading. The telephone is found in most of the outlying homes and one telephone box for public use is in the village proper. The postman carries stamps for sale to those people lacking transport to the Post Office. This practice is one not advised by the Post Office and carried out only by those postmen who wish to.
